des: "Cucumber slices are muddled with simple syrup and gently mixed over ice with kiwi vodka, lemon-lime soda, and freshly squeezed lime juice. It's an instant refresher! And the signature cocktail of the Cat and Fiddle in Hollywood, California."
ins: Gently muddle cucumber slices and simple syrup together in a cocktail shaker. Add ice, lemon-lime soda, vodka, and lime juice; stir briefly. Pour entire contents of shaker into a pint glass.
